description: Lists details of all the users in a specific permission group.

parameters.name: permissionGroupId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the permission group.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results per page.

nested_items.name: users
nested_items.description: Lists details of all users in a specific permission group.

nested_items.name: userId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the user.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the user.
CREATING --- The user creation is in progress.
ENABLED --- The user is created and is currently active.
DISABLED --- The user is currently inactive.

nested_items.name: firstName
nested_items.description: The first name of the user.

nested_items.name: lastName
nested_items.description: The last name of the user.

nested_items.name: emailAddress
nested_items.description: The email address of the user. The email address serves as a unique identifier for each user and cannot be changed after it's created.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Indicates the type of user.
SUPER_USER --- A user with permission to all the functionality and data in FinSpace.
APP_USER --- A user with specific permissions in FinSpace. The users are assigned permissions by adding them to a permission group.

nested_items.name: apiAccess
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the user can access FinSpace API operations.
ENABLED --- The user has permissions to use the API operations.
DISABLED --- The user does not have permissions to use any API operations.

nested_items.name: apiAccessPrincipalArn
nested_items.description: The IAM ARN identifier that is attached to FinSpace API calls.

nested_items.name: membershipStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of the user within a permission group.
ADDITION_IN_PROGRESS --- The user is currently being added to the permission group.
ADDITION_SUCCESS --- The user is successfully added to the permission group.
REMOVAL_IN_PROGRESS --- The user is currently being removed from the permission group.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates where a results page should begin.
